title: OCE PBE
body: I was wondering if there will ever be a PBE for OCE because i want too try all the new stuff in PBE but dont wanna transfer too NA, EUW, EUNE i think there should be a OCE PBE because i know OCE is a small region compared too others but maybe in this PBE we could just make it so its available from * time too * time and just accept people with a good rep (because OCE is apparently the most toxic server ever :P) i was just wondering and hoping that this one day might happen {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I think oce is too small and riot should just make it a game mode, but after the game u would have to give comments and crap... That would be grat{{champion:36}}
OCE is to small for anything like that. The queue for a match would be like 40 minutes.
Hey umm... if you transfer to NA or all the others, will you have to create a new account and start from scratch... meaning lv.1 summoner???.

> Hey umm... if you transfer to NA or all the others, will you have to create a new account and start from scratch... meaning lv.1 summoner???.

No if you buy the in game transfer you will keep everything on your account but just be on the NA/EUW etc... server
